name: Cake Ninja - XMAS
synopsis: It is simple, fun and a very popular game series! Slide the stylus across the screen to slice snowballs into small pieces like a true Ninja warrior. The more snowballs you slice, the longer you stay around, and the longer you survive, the higher your score. How long can you last? Key Features: - Simple, addictive gameplay - Colourful 3D graphics - Precise slice recognition - 8 challenging game modes - A collection of bonuses - Unlockable achievements - Post your results online and have a chance to earn 100,000 Nintendo DSi Points in the contest
